## Mission

Create dedicated contractor portal dashboard with key metrics.

## Branch

`claude/wave6/portal-dashboard`

## Scope

- Contractor-specific dashboard
- Project status overview
- Financial summary
- Action items

## Features

1. Contract status cards
2. Invoice summary
3. Deliverable tracker
4. Upcoming deadlines

## Output

`docs/WAVE6_PORTAL_DASHBOARD_COMPLETE.md`
